latex:
If $ a$ and $ b$ are two unequal positive numbers, then:\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ \frac {2ab}{a + b} > \sqrt {ab} > \frac {a + b}{2} \qquad\textbf{(B)}\ \sqrt {ab} > \frac {2ab}{a + b} > \frac {a + b}{2}$\\
$ \textbf{(C)}\ \frac {2ab}{a + b} > \frac {a + b}{2} > \sqrt {ab} \qquad\textbf{(D)}\ \frac {a + b}{2} > \frac {2ab}{a + b} > \sqrt {ab}$\\
$ \textbf{(E)}\ \frac {a + b}{2} > \sqrt {ab} > \frac {2ab}{a + b}$
